description:
RETRO CAT FAMILY

Raise a happy and healthy cat! Become a proper cat parent by ensuring all of its needs are fulfilled. If you want you can raise MULTIPLE pets at once!

REAL-TIME GAMEPLAY

Be careful! If you ignore your pets for too long, they can fall into sadness or even get sick. Their fate is within your hands.

Key Features:

- multiple cats to choose from
- relaxing gameplay loop
- retro aesthetic
- brief gameplay sessions
name: Catgotchi: Virtual Pet
intro: Welcome to Catgotchi: Virtual Pet, the ultimate game for all cat lovers! Raise and care for your virtual pet. These adorable pixel-art cats are sure to steal your heart!
